Strings.ConfigureNetworkInfo:
It's really important to select the correct network adapter or otherwise you will not be able to connect with the client to the server. In most cases the name of the Network adapter looks like "Ethernet" or "Wi-Fi" and the ip address in most cases looks like "192.168.178.xxx".
The default port for Macro Deck is 8191. If some other application uses this port, you can change it.
Strings.Name: Name
Strings.Creator: Creator
Strings.Label: Label
Strings.MacroDeckMustBeRestartedForTheChanges: Macro Deck must be restarted for the changes to take effect. Would you like to restart Macro Deck now?
Strings.Author: Author
Strings.TheFolderWillBeDeleted: The folder {0} with all its action buttons will be deleted.
Strings.TheProfileWillBeDeleted: The profile {0} with all its folders and action buttons will be deleted.
Strings.InitialSetupLetsConfigure: Let's configure your Macro Deck experience
Strings.InitialSetupConfigureGridPreferences: Now let's configure the grid to your preferences
Strings.InitialSetupPickAllPluginsYouNeed: Pick all the plugins you need
Strings.InitialSetupDontWorryInstallUninstallPlu: Don't worry, you can always install/uninstall plugins later in the package manager
Strings.InitialSetupInstallIconPacksPackageManag: You can also install icon packs later in the package manager
Strings.NeverInstallDLLFiles: Never install .dll files from sources you don't trust! .dll files from unknown sources may harm your system, only install it when you know what you do! Do you really like to install a .dll plugin?
Strings.XSuccessfullyUninstalled: {0} will be uninstalled. Macro Deck must be restarted to take the changes effect. Restart Macro Deck now?
Strings.SelectAPluginAndActionToBegin: Select a plugin and a action to begin
Strings.IconPackCalledXAlreadyExists: A icon pack called {0} already exists
Strings.TryAgainOrDownloadManually: Try again or download the update manually
Strings.IconImportQualityInfo:
High quality icons can lead to an increase of memory usage and loading times especially when using many big animated gifs.
For gifs it is recommended to use the low or the lowest preset.
Strings.IconSelectorManagedInfo: This icon pack is managed by the plugin manager
Strings.PluginCouldNotBeLoaded: Plugin could not be loaded. Perhaps the installed version of this plugin is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck.
Strings.XIsAnUnknownDevice: {0} is an unknown device and wants to connect to Macro Deck. Allow connection?
Strings.ShouldMacroDeckBlockConnectionsFromX: Should Macro Deck automatically block future connections from {0}?
Strings.FailedToStartServer: Failed to start the server. Perhaps the configured port is already in use or you set the incorrect network adapter. Confirm you set the correct network adapter in the settings and try to change the port.
Strings.PluginXCouldNotBeLoaded: {0} version {1} could not be loaded.Perhaps it is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck. Actions that uses this plugin, will not work until the plugin is updated.
Strings.PluginXCouldNotBeInstalled: {0} could not be installed. Perhaps it is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck
Strings.LatestVersionInstalled: The latest version is already installed
Strings.WarningDevVersions: Dev versions can be really instable and can cause crashes or data loss (configured action buttons, folders and profiles). You really want to change to the Dev update channel?
Strings.WarningBetaVersions: Beta versions can sometimes be instable and can cause crashes. You really want to change to the Beta update channel?
Strings.ErrorWhileLoadingPackageManager: Error while loading package manager. Perhaps you are not connected to the internet or Macro Deck is blocked by your firewall.
Strings.EnableIconCache: Enable icon cache (faster; higher memory usage)
Strings.ActionChangeFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the configured folder
Strings.ActionGoToParentFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the folders parent folder
Strings.ActionGoToRootFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the root folder
Strings.ActionChangeVariableValueDescription: Count up, count down, set a variable value and toggle variable value
Strings.ActionToggleActionButtonStateDescription: Toggles the state of this button
Strings.ActionSetActionButtonStateOffDescription: Sets the state of this button to "off"
Strings.ActionSetActionButtonStateOnDescription: Sets the state of this button to "on"
